Roland Agambire (born 19 April 1976)is a Ghanaian officer of Agams Holdings and Chairman and chief executive officer of the information and communication technology company RIg communications.
O guzobere Roagam Links na Machị 2001, mgbe ahụ dị ka ụlọ ọrụ nrụzi ekwentị mkpanaaka nke mechara gbasaa iji ghọọ ụlọ ọrụ mbụ na-emepụta ozi na nkwukọrịta, na-achịkọta ma na-enye ọzụzụ na Ghana
A na-ekwu na Rlg Group nwere ọnụnọ na China, Dubai, UAE, Angola, Nigeria, Kenya na Gambia, South Africa, Ghana, na Rwanda.
A mụrụ Agambire na Sirigu n'ebe ugwu Ghana
Ọ zụrụ dị ka onye nkuzi ma mesịa gụọ akwụkwọ na Ghana Institute of Management and Public Administration, ebe ọ nwetara nzere Bachelor of Science na nchịkwa azụmahịa.

Rlg Communications na-ewe ihe  ndị ọrụ 500 na-adịgide adịgide, 1,000 ndị ọzọ ma mepụta ọrụ maka ihe karịrị ndị ntorobịa 30,000 [dị ka onye si kwuo?] n'ime afọ iri gara aga site na imekọ ihe ọnụ na ndị isi dị iche iche na gọọmentị. Ụlọ ọrụ ọzụzụ nke ụlọ ọrụ ya, Rlg Institute of Technology na-etinye atụmatụ yiri nke ahụ na Naijiria na Gambia, na-arụkọ ọrụ na gọọmentị dị iche iche.
Agambire bụkwa onye isi oche nke AGAMS Holdings Limited ma bụrụkwa onye na-ahụ maka atụmatụ atụmatụ na njikwa nke ụlọ ọrụ iri na otu jikọtara ọnụ na-eme Holdings
O nwetala ọtụtụ mmata na onyinye maka  ọhụrụ, ọchụnta ego, mkpebi maka uto na ọrụ ebere.

Na Septemba 2012, ọ ghọrọ onye ọdụdụ ka enyere ya Chartered Institute of Marketing Ghana (CIMG) Marketing Man of the year for 2011. I Otu n'ime ngwaahịa ya, RIg phone, bụkwa nke a kwadoro ngwaahịa nke afọ 2011

Na ọkwa nke afọ 2012 nke Ghana Club 100, ụlọ ọrụ Ghana Investment Promotion Centre họpụtara Rlg dị ka ụlọ ọrụ nke abụọ kachasị mma na Ghana. A na-ekpekwa ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ikpe dị ka ụlọ ọrụ na-eto ngwa ngwa na Ghana, onye ndú na ngalaba ICT nke Ghana na onye kacha banye na Klọb 100

The South Africa-based African Leadership Network kpọrọ Roland n'etiti ndị ikpeazụ 12 na 2012 Africa Awards for Entrepreneurship otu Ernst na Young West Africa bụ ndị kpọrọ ya n'etiti Ndị ikpeazụ na 2011 Entrepreneur of the Year Awards

Na Jenụwarị 2013, Pan African Television Network, E-TV họpụtara ya dị ka onye Ghana kachasị emetụta n'afọ 2012 na ntuli aka ọ mere n'etiti ndị na-ekiri ya, ma mesịa pụta dị ka onye ọchụnta ego nke Afọ 2012 na asọmpi nke Entrepreneur Foundation nke Ghana haziri. O meriri onye isi ọchụnta ego nke afọ 2013 na City People Awards for Excellence
Agambire ekwuola ọtụtụ ihe omume mba ụwa na mpaghara dị elu gụnyere ọgbakọ mahadum, nzukọ azụmahịa, emume onyinye na nzukọ

Ọ bụ onye ọbịa nke World Bank Group dị ka onye enyemaka maka ogbako mpaghara na Ọrụ Ndị Ntorobịa na West Africa na isi obodo Naịjirịa, Abuja yana US Embassy na Ghana na Entrepreneurial Mentorship Program na Northern Ghana
Ọ gara n'ihu kwuo okwu na 1st Africa Entrepreneurship Conference na Mahadum Robert Gordon na Scotland, United Kingdom yana Africa Global Business Forum na Dubai.
Rlg nwere Global Office ya ugbu a na Dubai, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ole na ole n'Afrịka iji tinye ebe obibi ya zuru ụwa ọnụ n'akụkụ ụwa ahụ

N'afọ 2013 ọ mara ọkwa na ọ na-etinye ego na Hope City, ọrụ US $ 10bn maka ụlọ IT dị nso na Accra, nke e bu n'obi ịnwe ụlọ kachasị elu n'Africa. Mgbe mgbasa ozi niile na mgbasa ozi, Hope City ka bụ atụmatụ na akwụkwọ ma ugbu a anaghị eme atụmatụ.

N'afọ 2014, RLG malitere ikpokọta ekwentị ndị dị na Naịjirịa A kọrọ na ha butere ekwentị 50,000 ndị Nigeria gbakọrọ ọnụ na 2015Ụlọ ọrụ na-agbakọta RLG, nke a maara dị ka RLG na Adulawo Tech City, bụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze na nke onwe n'etiti ọchịchị steeti Sound na RLG Communication..
